name: Area (item)
content:
Description

An item with the area property always makes multi-target area attacks or invocations of the listed size and shape and cannot be used to make non-area attacks. If an item has multiple area sizes, the attacker chooses from them with each attack. Attack and action rolls do not incur any of the disadvantage penalties usually associated with multi-targeting.

data.description: An item with the area property always makes multi-target area attacks or invocations of the listed size and shape and cannot be used to make non-area attacks. If an item has multiple area sizes, the attacker chooses from them with each attack. Attack and action rolls do not incur any of the disadvantage penalties usually associated with multi-targeting.
data.wealthModifier: + disadvantage penalty incurred by the area via multi-targeting

name: Area (weapon)
content:
Description

An area weapon always makes multi-target area attacks of the listed size and shape and cannot be used for single-target attacks. If a weapon has multiple area sizes, the attacker chooses from them with each attack. These attacks do not incur any of the disadvantage penalties associated with multi-target attacks.

data.description: An area weapon always makes multi-target area attacks of the listed size and shape and cannot be used for single-target attacks. If a weapon has multiple area sizes, the attacker chooses from them with each attack. These attacks do not incur any of the disadvantage penalties associated with multi-target attacks.
data.wealthModifier: + disadvantage penalty incurred by the area via multi-targeting

name: Armor (type)
content:
Description

The item functions as a suit of armor of the given type, bestowing all of the benefits and restrictions of that armor upon the wearer.

data.description: The item functions as a suit of armor of the given type, bestowing all of the benefits and restrictions of that armor upon the wearer.
data.wealthModifier: Must be acquired or crafted first

name: Attribute (bonus/penalty)
content:
Description

When wielding the item, the owner’s attribute is increased or decreased by the amount indicated.

data.description: When wielding the item, the owner’s attribute is increased or decreased by the amount indicated.

name: Augmenting
content:
Description

Banes associated with this item can be delivered via an alternate method, such as a weapon or other damaging attack. Applying the item's augmentation to an attack is a move action which consumes the item. Upon application, you choose a bane the item can invoke. The next attack made with the augmented item triggers that bane if your roll is **equal to or above the target's defense score**. Examples of the *augmenting* property include poison, special ammo cartridges, and magical jewels that can be attuned to a weapon to enhance its power. All augmenting items must have the expendable property.

data.description: Banes associated with this item can be delivered via an alternate method, such as a weapon or other damaging attack. Applying the item's augmentation to an attack is a move action which consumes the item. Upon application, you choose a bane the item can invoke. The next attack made with the augmented item triggers that bane if your roll is **equal to or above the target's defense score**. Examples of the *augmenting* property include poison, special ammo cartridges, and magical jewels that can be attuned to a weapon to enhance its power. All *augmenting* items must have the *expendable* property.

name: Autonomous
content:
Description

When created, the item's crafter sets a specific condition that causes the item to trigger one particular action. This autonomy could be magical guidance, algorithmic targeting via a guidance system, or even mundane autonomy, such as pressure plates surrounded by murder holes (arrow slits with self-reloading crossbows).

data.description: When created, the item's crafter sets a specific condition that causes the item to trigger one particular action. This autonomy could be magical guidance, algorithmic targeting via a guidance system, or even mundane autonomy, such as pressure plates surrounded by murder holes (arrow slits with self-reloading crossbows).

name: Baneful (bane)
content:
Description

When making a damaging attack with this item, you may automatically inflict a listed bane if your attack roll exceeds the target's defense by 5 or more. The bane can be triggered this way in lieu of other banes, even if the item or wielder cannot access the bane. The invoking attribute for this bane is equal to the attacking attribute.

data.description: When making a damaging attack with this item, you may automatically inflict a listed bane if your attack roll exceeds the target's defense by 5 or more. The bane can be triggered this way in lieu of other banes, even if the item or wielder cannot access the bane. The invoking attribute for this bane is equal to the attacking attribute.
data.wealthModifier: 1 + WL cost of bane's lowest power level on the table in step 1

name: Consumable
content:
Description

A consumable item can be used once to invoke a boon at the listed power level. This boon invocation succeeds automatically without a roll and cannot be invoked with multi-targeting. Afterwards, the item is consumed and cannot be used again.

data.description: A consumable item can be used once to invoke a boon at the listed power level. This boon invocation succeeds automatically without a roll and cannot be invoked with multi-targeting. Afterwards, the item is consumed and cannot be used again.

name: Cursed (bane)
content:
Description

The wielder of this item is automatically afflicted with the indicated bane at the listed power level. The bane cannot be shaken off using the resist bane action. Furthermore, the cursed item cannot be unequipped unless the wielder is subject to the restoration boon at a power level high enough to dispel the bane.

data.description: The wielder of this item is automatically afflicted with the indicated bane at the listed power level. The bane cannot be shaken off using the resist bane action. Furthermore, the cursed item cannot be unequipped unless the wielder is subject to the *restoration* boon at a power level high enough to dispel the bane.
data.wealthModifier: WL cost for the bane on the table in step 1

name: Damage (type)
content:
Description

When making a damaging attack with this item, you may choose to have it inflict damage of the listed type in lieu of the type it would otherwise deal. This property can only be applied to an item once. The damage types are: precise, forceful, fire, cold, lightning, acid, influence, and entropy, though a GM may allow or create other types.

data.description: When making a damaging attack with this item, you may choose to have it inflict damage of the listed type in lieu of the type it would otherwise deal. This property can only be applied to an item once. The damage types are: precise, forceful, fire, cold, lightning, acid, influence, and entropy, though a GM may allow or create other types.

name: Deadly
content:
Description

Some weapons are so effective that their potency makes the wielder significantly more capable. Attacks made with this weapon gain advantage equal to their *deadly* value. A weapon cannot have a *deadly* value greater than 3.

data.description: Some weapons are so effective that their potency makes the wielder significantly more capable. Attacks made with this weapon gain advantage equal to their *deadly* value. A weapon cannot have a *deadly* value greater than 3.

name: Defensive
content:
Description

A defensive weapon grants advantage equal to the listed value when its wielder takes the defend action. Additionally, you gain a +1 armor bonus when wielding a defensive weapon (regardless of the defensive value listed). While wielding an item with the *defensive* property, you don't gain the advantage 1 to attacks normally associated with Melee One-handed or Two-handed weapons. A weapon cannot have a defensive value greater than 3.

data.description: A defensive weapon grants advantage equal to the listed value when its wielder takes the *defend* action. Additionally, you gain a +1 armor bonus when wielding a defensive weapon (regardless of the *defensive* value listed). While wielding an item with the *defensive* property, you don't gain the advantage 1 to attacks normally associated with Melee One-handed or Two-handed weapons. A weapon cannot have a *defensive* value greater than 3.

name: Delayed Ready
content:
Description

This weapon can only be used once per round. In addition, prior to using the weapon, the wielder must spend a move action to ready it.

data.description: This weapon can only be used once per round. In addition, prior to using the weapon, the wielder must spend a move action to ready it.

name: Expendable (item)
content:
Description

An expendable item can be used once to make an attack or invoke a bane. Afterwards, the item is expended and cannot be used again.

data.description: An expendable item can be used once to make an attack or invoke a bane. Afterwards, the item is expended and cannot be used again.

name: Expendable (weapon)
content:
Description

An expendable item can be used once to make an attack. Afterwards, the item is expended and cannot be used again.

data.description: An expendable item can be used once to make an attack. Afterwards, the item is expended and cannot be used again.

name: Faster than Light
content:
Description

The vehicle is capable of traveling faster than the speed of light. Doing so requires that a pilot expend a focus action on three consecutive rounds.

data.description: The vehicle is capable of traveling faster than the speed of light. Doing so requires that a pilot expend a focus action on three consecutive rounds.

name: Forceful
content:
Description

This weapon can make attacks with the Might attribute and invoke banes accessible via Might.

data.description: This weapon can make attacks with the Might attribute and invoke banes accessible via Might.

name: Guided Weapons
content:
Description

Attacks made with this vehicle are particularly difficult to evade. When the vehicle makes an attack using an attribute greater than zero, it rolls an additional d20 and keeps the higher die. This benefit only applies to attacks that target the Guard defense.

data.description: Attacks made with this vehicle are particularly difficult to evade. When the vehicle makes an attack using an attribute greater than zero, it rolls an additional d20 and keeps the higher die. This benefit only applies to attacks that target the Guard defense.

name: Heavy
content:
Description

The weapon is particularly heavy to carry. You may carry a maximum number of heavy items equal to your Might score.

data.description: The weapon is particularly heavy to carry. You may carry a maximum number of *heavy* items equal to your Might score.

name: Independent
content:
Description

A mount or vehicle with this property is capable of acting on its own, without the instructions of its controller. It receives a number of major actions every round equal to the value indicated. These cannot be used to perform move actions. The rider may still assign actions to the mount as usual.

data.description: A mount or vehicle with this property is capable of acting on its own, without the instructions of its controller. It receives a number of major actions every round equal to the value indicated. These cannot be used to perform move actions. The rider may still assign actions to the mount as usual.

name: Intelligent
content:
Description

The item is sentient and possesses its own psyche and personality, including mental and social attributes. It also has the ability to communicate audibly or telepathically. The item description will detail any attribute scores as well as communication limits (such as the ability to only communicate with the wielder).

data.description: The item is sentient and possesses its own psyche and personality, including mental and social attributes. It also has the ability to communicate audibly or telepathically. The item description will detail any attribute scores as well as communication limits (such as the ability to only communicate with the wielder).

name: Multi-Pilot
content:
Description

The vehicle can be piloted by a number of people equal to the value indicated. Each pilot can make use of the vehicle to make actions, but no more than 2 move actions can be taken by the vehicle in each round.

data.description: The vehicle can be piloted by a number of people equal to the value indicated. Each pilot can make use of the vehicle to make actions, but no more than 2 move actions can be taken by the vehicle in each round.

name: Persistent (boons)
content:
Description

An item with this property automatically invokes and sustains a single instance of the indicated boon without requiring the wielder to make an invocation roll or use the sustain a boon action. If the duration of a boon is instantaneous, the item automatically invokes the boon each round at the start of the wielder's turn. The wielder does not have to invoke this effect. The item's effect persists automatically unless the wielder spends a minor action to deactivate it, in which case it remains deactivated until the wielder spends a minor action to reactivate it.

data.description: An item with this property automatically invokes and sustains a single instance of the indicated boon without requiring the wielder to make an invocation roll or use the sustain a boon action. If the duration of a boon is instantaneous, the item automatically invokes the boon each round at the start of the wielder's turn. The wielder does not have to invoke this effect. The item's effect persists automatically unless the wielder spends a minor action to deactivate it, in which case it remains deactivated until the wielder spends a minor action to reactivate it.

name: Potent
content:
Description

Targets suffer disadvantage 1 on resist rolls to shake off banes inflicted by this item.

data.description: Targets suffer disadvantage 1 on resist rolls to shake off banes inflicted by this item.

name: Powerful
content:
Description

Bane or boon invocations made with this item have advantage equal to the item's powerful value. An item cannot have a powerful value greater than 3.

data.description: Bane or boon invocations made with this item have advantage equal to the item's *powerful* value. An item cannot have a *powerful* value greater than 3.

name: Precise
content:
Description

This weapon can be used to make attacks with the Agility attribute and invoke banes accessible via Agility.

data.description: This weapon can be used to make attacks with the Agility attribute and invoke banes accessible via Agility.

name: Reach
content:
Description

This weapon extends the natural melee range of the creature by 5'.

data.description: This weapon extends the natural melee range of the creature by 5'.

name: Reliable
content:
Description

The wielder does not have to roll to invoke this item's listed boons if they are targeting a single creature. The invocation automatically succeeds. If the item also has the area property, it may still benefit from the automatic success granted by the reliable property.

data.description: The wielder does not have to roll to invoke this item's listed boons if they are targeting a single creature. The invocation automatically succeeds. If the item also has the *area* property, it may still benefit from the automatic success granted by the *reliable* property.

name: Sentient
content:
Description

The item becomes either self-aware or capable of basic human reasoning. It has no inherent bond with its creator, and is treated like any other NPC. It gets its own turn and array of actions. The item gains no mental or social attributes, only the ability to think. At the GM's discretion, it may also gain a particular mode of movement, such as walking, climbing, flying, or swimming.

data.description: The item becomes either self-aware or capable of basic human reasoning. It has no inherent bond with its creator, and is treated like any other NPC. It gets its own turn and array of actions. The item gains no mental or social attributes, only the ability to think. At the GM's discretion, it may also gain a particular mode of movement, such as walking, climbing, flying, or swimming.

name: Slaying (creature type)
content:
Description

When the item is used to make a damaging attack against the indicated creature type and exceeds the target’s defense by 5 or more, the target immediately dies.

data.description: When the item is used to make a damaging attack against the indicated creature type and exceeds the target’s defense by 5 or more, the target immediately dies.

name: Slow
content:
Description

If you are wielding this weapon at the beginning of combat, you gain disadvantage 2 on your initiative roll. If you are not wielding the weapon but plan to use it on your first turn, this penalty is still applied. If you are wielding multiple weapons, your initiative modifier is equal to the slowest among them (slow, swift, or neither).

data.description: If you are wielding this weapon at the beginning of combat, you gain disadvantage 2 on your initiative roll. If you are not wielding the weapon but plan to use it on your first turn, this penalty is still applied. If you are wielding multiple weapons, your initiative modifier is equal to the slowest among them (slow, swift, or neither).

name: Special
content:
Description

The item possesses a unique property that is explained in full detail in its description.

data.description: The item possesses a unique property that is explained in full detail in its description.

name: Stationary
content:
Description

The bulk and weight of this weapon is enormous. Moving it requires a focus action, which allows it to be moved up to 30 feet.

data.description: The bulk and weight of this weapon is enormous. Moving it requires a focus action, which allows it to be moved up to 30 feet.

name: Swift
content:
Description

If you are wielding this weapon at the beginning of combat, you gain advantage 2 on your initiative roll. If you are not wielding the weapon but plan to use it on your first turn, you still get this bonus. If you are wielding multiple weapons, your initiative modifier is equal to the slowest among them (slow, swift, or neither).

data.description: If you are wielding this weapon at the beginning of combat, you gain advantage 2 on your initiative roll. If you are not wielding the weapon but plan to use it on your first turn, you still get this bonus. If you are wielding multiple weapons, your initiative modifier is equal to the slowest among them (slow, swift, or neither).

name: Targeted Weapons
content:
Description

A vehicle with this property is more potent in the hands of a skilled operator. If the pilot's Agility score is greater than the attacking attribute score of the vehicle, attacks receive advantage equal to the difference. Attacks are still made by the vehicle and not the pilot.

data.description: A vehicle with this property is more potent in the hands of a skilled operator. If the pilot's Agility score is greater than the attacking attribute score of the vehicle, attacks receive advantage equal to the difference. Attacks are still made by the vehicle and not the pilot.

name: Unfailing
content:
Description

Any dice rolled when using this item’s abilities treat a result of 1 as a result of the maximum instead. Rolling a 1 also results in a dice explosion just as if the die had rolled maximum. So, for example, rolling a 1 on a d8 would be treated as an 8. A 1 on a d20 would be a 20.

data.description: Any dice rolled when using this item’s abilities treat a result of 1 as a result of the maximum instead. Rolling a 1 also results in a dice explosion just as if the die had rolled maximum. So, for example, rolling a 1 on a d8 would be treated as an 8. A 1 on a d20 would be a 20.

name: Weapon (type)
content:
Description

The item is a weapon of the given type. It possesses all of the properties of that weapon and can leverage them when making attacks.

data.description: The item is a weapon of the given type. It possesses all of the properties of that weapon and can leverage them when making attacks.
data.wealthModifier: Must be acquired or crafted first
